metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36244 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
The daemon in GENIVI diagnostic log and trace (DLT), is vulnerable to aheap-based buffer overflow that could allow an attacker to remotely executearbitrary code on the DLT-Daemon (versions prior to 2.18.6).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-36244` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dlt-daemon - 2.18.6-1
dlt-tools - 2.18.6-1
libdlt-examples - 2.18.6-1
libdlt2 - 2.18.6-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: dlt-daemon package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.18.6-1').
